channel.title: Version 1.1 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 1.1.1 (2021-07-04) Maintenance [task] theme: prepare for new hugo theme registration #13 1.1.0 (2021-07-02) Enhancements [feature] mermaid: expose options in config.toml #4 Fixes [bug] mermaid: config option for CDN url not used #12 [bug] mermaid: only highlight text in HTML elements #10 [bug] mermaid: support pan & zoom for graphs #9 [bug] mermaid: code fences not always rendered #6 [bug] mermaid: search term on load may bomb chart #5 Maintenance [task] mermaid: update to 8.10.2 #7
